org.cloudifysource.esc.driver.provisioning
Interface CustomNode

All Known Implementing Classes:
CustomNodeImpl
public interface CustomNode

Interface for a custom cloud node, used for example by the BYON cloud driver.

Since:
2.0.1
Author:
noak

Method Detail

getProviderId

String getProviderId()
Returns:
id of the server within the naming scope it was created. potentially generated by the service.

getHostName

String getHostName()

getId

String getId()
A means to uniquely address this resource within a provider. For example, if the namespace of a node or image is region based, the id will likely include both the region and the provider-supplied id encoded to avoid collisions.

Returns:
unique id within your account on the provider

getLoginPort

int getLoginPort()
Returns:
the TCP port used for terminal connections. Generally, this is port 22 for ssh.

getUsername

String getUsername()
Gets the user name required to log in to the node.

Returns:
The username as a String

getCredential

String getCredential()
Gets the password required to log in to the node.

Returns:
The password as a String

getKeyFile

String getKeyFile()
Gets the private key required to log in to the node.

Returns:
The private key as a String

getPublicIP

String getPublicIP()
Gets the public IP address, the IP address used for external communication.

Returns:
The public IP address as a String

getPrivateIP

String getPrivateIP()
Gets the private IP address (or host name), used for internal communication.

Returns:
The private IP address as a String

resolve

void resolve()
             throws UnknownHostException
Resolve the addresses of this node. this method should populate the privateIp and hostName fields of the node with the resolved value as defined in the network.

Throws:
UnknownHostException

setNodeName

void setNodeName(String nodeName)
Sets the node name.

Parameters:
nodeName - A user defined name of the server.

getNodeName

String getNodeName()
Gets the node name.

Returns:
user defined name for the node.

setGroup

void setGroup(String group)
Sets the node's group.

Parameters:
group - The group name

getGroup

String getGroup()
Tag used for all resources that belong to the same logical group. run, destroy commands are scoped to group.

Returns:
group for this node, or null, if not a part of a group

setLoginPort

void setLoginPort(int loginPort)
Sets the login port for this node.

Parameters:
loginPort - the login port.
